name: VA: Veterans Headstone And Grave Marker
description: A headstone, grave or niche marker, or medallion to honor a veteran, service member, or eligible family member.
fullDescription: A headstone, grave or niche marker, or medallion to honor a veteran, service member, or eligible family member.
whatTheyOffer: Provides a wide range of benefits in support of veterans, service members, and their families.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The deceased served in the active military
- The deceased's service status is: active-duty service member, honorable, general or other than dishonorable discharge, or member of the National Guard/Reserves
- The deceased is buried in a grave with a privately purchased headstone or an unmarked grave
- The applicant's relationship to the deceased is: spouse, child, parent, or other family member

Visit the official website or call for more information.
